Package voltage.core

Class VoltageKeyboard

java.lang.Object
voltage.core.VoltageComponent
voltage.core.VoltageKeyboard
public class VoltageKeyboard
extends VoltageComponent
A virtual keyboard control

    • VoltageKeyboard

      public VoltageKeyboard​(java.lang.String name, VoltageModule module, VoltageKeyboard.KeyboardOrientation orientation)
      Creates the VoltageKeyboard object.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the control
      module - the module this belongs to
      orientation - the keyboard orientation

    • VoltageKeyboard

      public VoltageKeyboard​(java.lang.String name, VoltageModule module)
      Creates the VoltageKeyboard object with a horizontal orientation.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the control
      module - the module this belongs to

  • Method Details

    • SetKeyboardColors

      public void SetKeyboardColors​(java.awt.Color whiteNote, java.awt.Color blackNote, java.awt.Color keySepLine, java.awt.Color mouseOverKeyOverlay, java.awt.Color keyDownOverlay, java.awt.Color whiteNoteTextLabel, java.awt.Color blackNoteTextLabel, java.awt.Color upDownControlBackground, java.awt.Color upDownArrow, java.awt.Color shadowAtTopOfKeyboard)
      Set the keyboard colors.
      Parameters:
      whiteNote - the white note color
      blackNote - the black note color
      keySepLine - The key separation line color between white keys.
      mouseOverKeyOverlay - the hover color for white keys.
      keyDownOverlay - the key down color for white keys.
      whiteNoteTextLabel - the text color over white keys.
      blackNoteTextLabel - the text color over black keys.
      upDownControlBackground - background color of the control that lets you adjust the octave.
      upDownArrow - color of up/down arrow.
      shadowAtTopOfKeyboard - slight shadow at top of keyboard.

    • SetKeySizes

      public void SetKeySizes​(float whiteKeyWidth, float blackKeyWidthRatio, float blackKeyLengthRatio)
      Sets the size and ratio of the keys
      Parameters:
      whiteKeyWidth - the width of a white key.
      blackKeyWidthRatio - the relative size of a black key.
      blackKeyLengthRatio - the relative length of a black key.

    • SetKeyRange

      public void SetKeyRange​(int startNote, int endNote)
      Sets the range of the keyboard.
      Parameters:
      startNote - Valid from 0 to 127
      endNote - Valid from 0 to 127

    • SetScrollButtonsVisible

      public void SetScrollButtonsVisible​(boolean bShow)
      Sets whether the scroll buttons are visible.
      Parameters:
      bShow - set to true to see the scroll buttons.

    • SetScrollButtonWidth

      public void SetScrollButtonWidth​(int width)
      Sets the width of the scroll buttons.
      Parameters:
      width - the width in pixels of the scroll buttons.

    • SetVelocity

      public void SetVelocity​(float velocity, boolean useMousePositionForVelocity)
      Sets the velocity for notes coming from the control.
      Parameters:
      velocity - the velocity from 0.0f to 1.0f to use for notes.
      useMousePositionForVelocity - if true, clicks higher up on the note generate higher velocities.

    • SetMidiChannel

      public void SetMidiChannel​(int midiChannelNumber)
      Sets the MIDI channel for this control.
      Parameters:
      midiChannelNumber - the channel from 1 to 16 to generate MIDI notes on.

    • IsNoteOn

      public boolean IsNoteOn​(int midiChannel, int midiNoteNumber)
      Is a note down?
      Parameters:
      midiChannel - the channel of the MIDI note. (1 to 16)
      midiNoteNumber - the MIDI note to check. (0 to 127)
      Returns:
      true if the note is down.

    • SetNoteOn

      public void SetNoteOn​(int midiChannel, int midiNoteNumber, float velocity)
      Turns a note on.
      Parameters:
      midiChannel - the channel of the MIDI note. (1 to 16)
      midiNoteNumber - the MIDI note to check. (0 to 127)
      velocity - the velocity to use. (0.0f to 1.0f)

    • SetNoteOff

      public void SetNoteOff​(int midiChannel, int midiNoteNumber, float velocity)
      Turns a note off.
      Parameters:
      midiChannel - the channel of the MIDI note. (1 to 16)
      midiNoteNumber - the MIDI note to check. (0 to 127)
      velocity - the velocity to use. (0.0f to 1.0f)

    • SetAllNotesOff

      public void SetAllNotesOff​(int midiChannel)
      Turns off all notes on a MIDI channel
      Parameters:
      midiChannel - the channel of the MIDI note. (1 to 16) Use -1 for all channels.

    • SetKeyPressesToAutomaticallyGoTo_IOModule

      public void SetKeyPressesToAutomaticallyGoTo_IOModule​(boolean bAutoGoToIOPanel)
      Should MIDI notes go to the IO Panel?
      Parameters:
      bAutoGoToIOPanel - flag to set whether notes should go to the IOPanel.

    • SetNoteText

      public void SetNoteText​(int noteNum, java.lang.String textStr)
      Sets text on a key.
      Parameters:
      noteNum - the number of the note (0 to 127)
      textStr - the text to display on the note.

    • ClearNoteText

      public void ClearNoteText​(int noteNum)
      Clears the note text.
      Parameters:
      noteNum - the note to clear (0 to 127)

    • ClearAllNoteText

      public void ClearAllNoteText()
      Clears the text from all notes.

    • SetKeyPressForNote

      public void SetKeyPressForNote​(int keyCode, int midiNoteOffsetFromC)
      Bind a key to a note.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - the keycode to bind.
      midiNoteOffsetFromC - the key offset from C. IE: 0 would be C, 1 would be C#, etc.

    • RemoveKeyPressForNote

      public void RemoveKeyPressForNote​(int midiNoteOffsetFromC)
      Unbinds a key from a note.
      Parameters:
      midiNoteOffsetFromC - the offset of the note from middle C.

    • SetKeyPressBaseOctave

      public void SetKeyPressBaseOctave​(int newOctaveNumber)
      Sets the octave that keypresses trigger. If you bind keypresses to this control, this is the octave of MIDI notes that it will trigger.
      Parameters:
      newOctaveNumber - this is the octave of MIDI notes that it will trigger.

    • SetShowKeyPressMappingsOnKeys

      public void SetShowKeyPressMappingsOnKeys​(boolean bShow)
      Show the bindings on the control?
      Parameters:
      bShow - if true, the control displays the key bindings.

    • SetOctaveForMiddleC

      public void SetOctaveForMiddleC​(int octaveNumForMiddleC)
      Sets the octave for middle C Some set middle C to octave 4 and some perfer it at octave 5.
      Parameters:
      octaveNumForMiddleC - the octave #.

    • GetOctaveForMiddleC

      public int GetOctaveForMiddleC()
      Returns the current octave for middle C.
      Returns:
      the octave being used for middle C.
